gui_package

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui_package.Application
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This is the main class of the GUI application. If you just need to implement new functionalities, it is irrelevant to modify it.
    Author:
    pierre
